p.span: Klondike ISD makes every effort to ensure persons with diabilities are afforded an opportunity to access our programs and services, including online content and functionality. If any online content or functionality is not accessible, please help us ensure your access by emailing randy.leonard@klondikeisd.net or calling the school at 806-462-7332
